alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 3:07PM EST until March 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected, along with the refreezing of wet surfaces. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey, southern Connecticut and southeast New York. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will fall quickly during the day Saturday resulting in a quick freezing of any standing water resulting in difficult travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
